documents.content: The scientific method is a systematic approach to investigation: 1) Ask a question 2) Form a hypothesis 3) Make a prediction 4) Test the prediction 5) Analyze results. This method is fundamental to all scientific research.

Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy. The basic equation is: 6CO2 + 6H2O + light energy â†’ C6H12O6 + 6O2. This process is essential for life on Earth.
